DOC.brief_summary: Interview pregnant lactating mother Gainesville , FL area optimize ; clinical study recruitment retention , patient-centered outcome , stool collection procedure .
DOC.brief_title: The BEACH Study- Interviews With Pregnant Lactating Women
DOC.detailed_description: This interview study enroll mother 26 week great pregnancy lactate mother less 1 year . The focus interview assess recruitment , patient-centered outcome , stool collection procedure via individualized interview data collection . Participants recruit great North Central Florida area . Data collection include questionnaires/surveys well minimal risk non-invasive biological sample stool , human milk , saliva , vaginal swab , urine collection . Participants see University Florida Clinical Translational Science Institute .
DOC.criteria: Females 18 > 45 , 2638 week pregnant , anticipate delivery area hospital , live Florida , commit exclusively breastfeed . Females 18 > 45 , activity lactate < 12 month , commit exclusive breastfeeding . Living Florida Smoking Preeclampsia History preterm delivery ( < 35 week ) Only one breast capable lactation milk production inadequate Any maternal antibiotic last 2 week delivery Any alcohol consumption Drug use
